divs: Sighting DetailsDriving South on Route 206 just south of Atsion Lake. 2 passengers in my car and I observed a dark cigar somewhat disk shaped object to our south approx. 1 mile away it seemed stationary however 3 times within 2 minutes of the total visual event it reflected sunlight off the object highly reflective.. first we thought it was a small plane as theres an airport a few miles away but it had no wings and was not a helicopter not the shape. perplexing reactions trying to logically think was it was it just disappeared from view after 2 months as we lost sight of it driving..
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hammonton
There were no other sightings in Hammonton on or around November 26th 2011
